inair.app

Class IABaseLayeredItemLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • inair.app.IAChildLayout
        • inair.app.IABaseLayeredItemLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAController, IALayered, IALayout

    public abstract class IABaseLayeredItemLayout
extends IAChildLayout
implements IALayered

    Base class for layered item controller

    Should be used to handle all controller events on it's layered item view

    Note this class is currently under early design and development. The API will likely change in later updates of the compatibility library, requiring changes to the source code of apps when they are compiled against the newer version.

    Copyright (c) 2014 SeeSpace.co. All rights reserved.

    • Method Detail

      • changeActiveMode

        public void changeActiveMode(boolean active)
        Description copied from interface: IALayered
        Call to change active mode of layer in layered navigation
        Specified by:
        changeActiveMode in interface IALayered
        Parameters:
        active - if true, layer will be in active mode, this mean the door will open and content of this layer will be displayed if false, the door will close and an white rect will be displayed as placeholder of content
